database.name: VIEW SMSP_ORDER_SUPPLIERS_V
database.view: SELECT c_order_id AS smsp_order_suppliers_v_id, ad_client_id, ad_org_id, isactive, created, createdby, updated, updatedby, issotrx, documentno, docstatus, docaction, processing, processed, c_bpartner_id, c_costcenter_id, dateordered, grandtotal FROM c_order WHERE issotrx = 'N' AND docstatus = 'CO'
